detail_desc: Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Long-sleeved dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in a soft, organic cotton double weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and elasticated hems.
Bucket bag in patterned cotton canvas with a drawstring that also functions as a shoulder strap. Shoulder strap and base in leather and an attached, leather inner bag with a zip. Size 9x35x36 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bucket bag in imitation suede with a drawstring and an imitation leather handle at the top. Detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal fastener. Size 18.5x27x33 cm.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Straight-cut, V-neck T-shirt in soft jersey made from pima cotton containing some silk in a relaxed style.

Short, V-neck dress in jersey crêpe with visible seams at the front, narrow shoulder straps and decorative crossover straps at the back, one pair of which can be tied. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with mesh sections and a racer back.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and short sleeves with a slit and ties. Unlined.
Sandals in scuba fabric with a hook and loop fastening and fluted rubber soles. Platform 4 cm.
Backpack in nylon with a roll-top opening with an adjustable tab and plastic fastener. Handle at the top, adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a padded back plate in mesh. Lined. Size 14x27x46 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft fabric. Top with a motif on the front, press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist. Lined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Smart shirt in a woven cotton blend with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie or bow tie.

Set with a dress and leggings in soft jersey. Dress in patterned cotton with 3/4-length sleeves with frilled cuffs, fastening with concealed press-studs at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.
Bikini top and bottoms. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a double-layer front with a laser-cut pattern and a gold-coloured metal decoration. Fully lined bottoms with laser-cut, scalloped edges.
Push-up bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. T-shirt in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Top in soft, printed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cargo trousers in a lightweight cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, and flap leg and back pockets with a press-stud. Tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Trousers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a welt back pocket and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Wide satin maxi dress with short batwing sleeves, a wrapover at the top, seam with a tie belt at the waist and wide skirt with slits in the sides. Lined at the top.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of chino shorts in cotton. Jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Shorts in woven fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and diagonal side pockets.
Cropped crocheted top in soft cotton with a V-neck, narrow straps that tie at the back of the neck and lacing at the back. Unlined.
Tube scarf in a soft jacquard knit.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and slim legs with creases. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Metal keyring and carabiner hook with an imitation leather strap. Length approx. 14 cm.
Joggers in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a round neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck and long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the waist and a gathered tier for added width. Unlined.
Cotton canvas boots with toe caps and lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Two-strand metal necklace. One of the chains has small round pendants. Adjustable length 38-45 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim and sewn-on tie belt at the front. Side pockets and tapered legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with a tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Shorts in viscose twill with decorative zips at the front, an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
Set with a cap and sun hat. Cap in cotton twill with a print motif on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Sun hat in a patterned cotton weave. Cotton lining.

Set with a blouse and pair of trousers in an airy weave. Blouse with an elasticated neckline, buttons down the front and short butterfly sleeves. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with an embroidered motif around the neckline and short frill trims around the sleeves.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and flared hems. The jeans are made partly from organic cotton.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with block heels, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Front and back pockets and tapered legs.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft pima cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and lace shoulder straps.
Jacket in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and kangaroo pockets. Unlined.
Metal rings in various designs.
Shorts in soft functional fabric that effectively regulates body heat to help you maintain a comfortable temperature. The shorts have a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and thighs. 80 denier.
Dress in a striped cotton weave with a collar, button placket and butterfly sleeves. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and a V-neck with gathers.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, seam at the waist and peplum.
Hotpants in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wide waistband containing a key pocket.
Round-necked blouse in a patterned weave with an opening and a concealed button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with pleats and buttoned cuffs, and a seam at the hem with a tie detail.
Wide trousers in lightly crinkled velvet made from a silk blend. Wide, covered elastication at the waist, pockets in the side seams and straight legs.

Parka in water-repellent functional fabric with a fleece-lined stand-up collar that has a grosgrain tab and press-stud fastener and contains a concealed drawstring hood. Long sleeves with an adjustable tab and fastener at the cuffs. A taped zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, fleece-lined side pockets with a flap and press-stud, and a concealed drawstring at the waist and hem. Vent with press-studs at the back to shorten the back section for ease of movement. Detachable elastic braces so you can carry the parka on your back. Reflective print on the sleeves. Lining with taped seams.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirts in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with a button placket and picot trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

prod_name: Catch me if you can blazer
detail_desc: Long velvet jacket with a partially concealed double-breasted fastening at the front and notch lapels. Welt front pockets with a flap and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved shirt in a woven cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Jacket in soft pile. Hood with appliqués that continue down the back, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets.
Straight-cut jacket in soft jersey with long notch lapels, welt front pockets and sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons.
Cowl-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some wool in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Bag in soft imitation suede with a drawstring closure, handle and detachable, adjustable shoulder strap at the top. Unlined. Size 18x27x32.5 cm..
Imitation leather sandals with crossover straps at the front, one in woven fabric. Hook and loop fastener around the heel and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Soft swim cap with a peak at the front and a flap at the back to protect both the face and back of the neck.
